titles.title: SECURE Facilities Act of 2011
Supporting Employee Competency and Updating Readiness Enhancements for Facilities Act of 2011
A bill to protect Federal employees and visitors, improve the security of Federal facilities and authorize and modernize the Federal Protective Service.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2351-2353)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
